 @PropertySource(value="classpath:application.properties")

extends Object
implements StockMarketService

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BigDecimal calculateDividendYield(String ticker, double price)
      Calculates dividend yield for the given instrument and price For Common stock it will be - (lastDividend/Price) For preferred stock it will be - (fixed Dividend * Par Value)/Price
      double calculateGbceShareIndex()
      Calculates geometric mean for all the stocks.
      BigDecimal calculatePERatio(String ticker, double price)
      Calculates PE Ration for the given instrument and price The calculation will use the formula - (price/dividend) First dividend will be calculated according to the StockMarketService.calculateDividendYield(java.lang.String, double) and then use the above formula to calculate PE ratio
      BigDecimal calculateVwapPrice(String ticker)
      Calculates VWAP price for given stock.

      • calculateDividendYield

        public BigDecimal calculateDividendYield(String ticker,
                                         double price)
        Description copied from interface: StockMarketService
        Calculates dividend yield for the given instrument and price For Common stock it will be - (lastDividend/Price) For preferred stock it will be - (fixed Dividend * Par Value)/Price
        Specified by:
        calculateDividendYield in interface StockMarketService
        Parameters:
        ticker - Stock symbol to calculate dividend yield
        price - price used in PE ration calculation
        Returns:
        returns calculated dividend yield @BigDecimal

      • calculatePERatio

        public BigDecimal calculatePERatio(String ticker,
                                   double price)
        Description copied from interface: StockMarketService
        Calculates PE Ration for the given instrument and price The calculation will use the formula - (price/dividend) First dividend will be calculated according to the StockMarketService.calculateDividendYield(java.lang.String, double) and then use the above formula to calculate PE ratio
        Specified by:
        calculatePERatio in interface StockMarketService
        Parameters:
        ticker - Stock symbol to calculate PE Ratio
        price - price used in PE ration calculation
        Returns:
        returns calculated PE ratio @BigDecimal
